text: Uni has now completely closed so im hoping that ill be able to finish my film and rendering from home! Was wondering if you could give my current progress a look if you find the time? <https://bluubat.wordpress.com/2020/03/19/wip-and-to-do-list/|https://bluubat.wordpress.com/2020/03/19/wip-and-to-do-list/> the password to view is memaid22 and i have time to go back and improve on/ re-render a few shots, so dont worry about suggesting improvements for shots that are already rendered! I particularly want to work on shot 17 (00:48) to make the clown look more scared as he clings to the railing, but im struggling to make it look right! Any feedback would be hugely appreciated!

attachments.title: WIP and to doÂ list
attachments.text:
I’ve almost finished now! just a few more things to do:
Production:
– Fix the flickering light on the posters in shot 6 and re-render
– Render remaining 8 shots
– IF TIME: add a blink for the transitions between shots 13 and 14, and re-render relevant frames.
– IF TIME: work on shot 17 to make the movement more believable, and re-render.
– IF TIME: add a shot at the start where we see the whole circus and the clown, render and write short musical intro to accompany.
Post Production:
– Add folie and sfx
– Add motion blur to relevant shots
– Colour correct
– Cut down any lingering moments if possible
